lead_paragraph: PERERA--Charith, 58, loving husband and father, successful entrepreneur, and compassionate leader who on July 8, 2016 passed away. A graduate of the Sloan School of Management at MIT, he founded ShipXpress Inc., and led it as CEO for 16 years. He will live forever in the memory of his wife Chinta, his children Samantha, Chrisantha, Janaki, Rajiv, and Anita, and all those who came to know his tireless encouragement and ready smile. Services are being handled through Ponte Vedra Valley Funeral Home: www.pontevedravalley.com/ notices/Charith-Perera 1/3
